name: Water Sorting
description:
Water Sorting - Water Sort Puzzle. Try to sort the colored water in the bottle until all colors in the same bottle. Pour colored water from one tube to another tube to complete the level. Water Sorting is a relaxing and challenging puzzle game in which you must sort the coloured water in the glasses until they are all arranged by a similar shade.

★ HOW TO PLAY:

• Tap and hold any glass to pour water into another glass.

• You can only pour the water if there is enough space on the glass.

• Try not to get stuck - but don’t worry, you can always restart the level at any time.

Water Sort Puzzle Game - colorful game seems easy yet challenging as well. The higher level you reach, the harder it gets since there are more tubes to arrange colors.

FEATURES:

- Bright colorful bottles, Control with one finger.

- FREE & EASY TO PLAY, hard enough to challenge your brain

- Calming and relaxing sound

- Multiple unique gameplay with different difficulty levels

Enjoy Water Sort Puzzle - Color Sorting Game now - pouring water never gets such exciting!
